attributes.action: Stop housing development outside core strategies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a housing strategy from Central Government to build houses for the future to avoid a housing shortage.

These developments are within core strategies developed and published by Local Authorities.

We must stop all housing development applications that are outside these core strategies.

Picket Piece in Andover, Hampshire is one such area, it is a village of less than 100 houses, it is oustide any current core strategy, yet a planning application has been submitted to build 900 houses.

This is wrong, plainly wrong.
